name: Duel Timers
description:
Duel Timers is a local multiplayer FPS Platformer. Fight against a friend with On-the-Couch Local Multiplayer or through Steam Remote Play (All multiplayer requires a Bluetooth Gamepad). Jump from platform to platform on a vertical arena to avoid enemy players and the impending void!

Master Jump Charging, Quick Falling, and Double Jumping to maximize your movement. Collect Ammo Boxes and Med Kits to keep the fight going! Activate Power-Ups to annoy your friends or give yourself an advantage! Duel Timers is a unique take on two classic genres!

Important Note: Duel Timers requires both a Controller and Keyboard and Mouse. Player 1 will always play on Keyboard, and Player 2 will always play on Controller. This also applies for players using Remote Play Together. Remote Play Together also works across platforms, but a controller is still needed for Player 2, as is the case for all Remote Play Together games with multiple independent players.
